about_the_game:
Summary

Dart the Dog is a fast-paced platformer built around gaining speed and momentum by collecting bones.

You are Dart (the Dog) and whose home is Paw Plains, but the once peaceful paw plains has recently become overrun with bones and hostile skeletons. The evil necromancer Necron is the root cause of this! Your goal is to defeat Necron and return Paw Plains back to the beautiful and serene paradise it once was.

Do you have it in you? Or will you let Necron destroy your home?

Features

In the current release, there are three levels implemented as well as the beginning of the narrative. Additionally, there are three unique power ups and skeleton enemies that patrol the levels. Lastly, the final level contains a boss that will test your skills you have honed in the prior levels.

name: Dart The Dog

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5/AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is lightweight so the above specs, might be overkill themselves. Just don't play on a potato.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7/AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A fast-paced platformer built around gaining speed and momentum.
